stereo.tools.factor_analysis¶

stereo.tools.factor_analysis(x, n_pcs)¶

the dim reduce function of factor analysis

Parameters

  • x – 2D array, shape (M, N)

  • n_pcs – the number of features for a return array after reducing.

Returns

ndarray of shape (n_samples, n_components) Embedding of the training data in low-dimensional space.
